experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: CAD-IT Consultants (M) Sdn Bhd
workDescription: Worked as a software developer in the IoT team.
Demonstrated proficiency in utilizing NODE-Red, streamlining development processes for efficient communication within IoT projects.
Engaged extensively with Siemens products, specifically Mindsphere or Insights Hub, contributing to the optimization of applications and overall efficiency of IoT solutions.
Possess a strong knowledge of communication protocols, including MQTT, TCP, and UDP, crucial for ensuring seamless data exchange and connectivity within IoT ecosystems.

experiences.title: Intern Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: Digital Penang Sdn Bhd
workDescription: Worked in a team using agile scrum framework.
Utilized Vue.js for front-end features, Loopback on Node.js for RESTful APIs, and MySQL for database management.
Deployed applications on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and integrated with Firebase for real-time data storage and authentication.
Contributed to the development of new features and improvements of existing ones.
